title: Eco-Lodge Wilderness Safari Experience
description: Feel a million miles away from everything at Wildman Wilderness Lodge, a secluded resort located two hours east of Darwin, in the heart of the Australian bushland. Reconnect with nature and surround yourself with comfort as you experience two nights in a luxe Safari Tent with daily buffet breakfast, nightly multi-course dinner, a bottle of wine on arrival and an AU$65 credit to be used towards activities amid nature.
offer_address: Point Stuart Road, Mary River Wetlands, 0822 Point Stuart, Australia
